titleStmt.title: The Present condition of France in reference to her revenues comparing them with the infinite expenges [sic] she is forc'd to be at : demonstrating thereby that it is impossible for her to support her self if the war with the confederates continues / done out of French.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Rhodes ... and John Harris ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
